Name: Grilled
About the game: Grilled is an action game where the player has the goal of eliminating all characters in order to successfully complete a level. Grilled offers two modes: Campaign and Carnage. In Campaign mode, the player will go through a series of levels of increasing difficulty where he/she will have to eliminate all characters to complete the level and unlock the following one. In Carnage mode, the player will have the freedom to eliminate a horde of characters which continue to spawn indefinitely.
